title: How Can We Understand Patients' Values, Preferences, and Expectations in Urology?
abstract: Understanding patients' values and preferences is essential for patient-centred care. Qualitative research provides a broader understanding from a patient perspective at different time points across the patient's life. Quantitative methods quantify specific preferences and answer specific questions that have been informed by qualitative work.
